mig.core

Class Information

  • java.lang.Object
    • mig.core.Item
      • mig.core.EnigmaItem
        • mig.core.Information

  • public class Information
extends EnigmaItem
    The class Information represents the informations given by the characters during the game.

    it uses inheritance from the class EnigmaItem

    Version:
    22/11/2016
    Author:
    Group 8
    See Also:
    EnigmaItem

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Information(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String info)
      Constructor of the class Information The name cannot be null , if it is the name will be "unknown name" The information cannot be null , as default it will be : "unknown information"

        public Information(java.lang.String name,
